item.title: Creative coding
item.description: Creative coding Introduction My research imperatives run along the threads of transmediation, intersemiotic translation, post-disciplinarity (interdisciplinarity, multidiscplinary) and the general concerns of Human Computer Interaction (HCI). Key words: big-data, connectivity, data, creative-coding, emacs, interaction, interdisciplinary, interconnection, machine learning, multidisciplinary, real-time, streaming, web Objectives This blog communicates the experience of building tools for interactive and data-driven audiovisuality using creative coding environments and techniques. This blog contains some basic information and tips (installations and usage) about emacs, SuperCollider, Raspberry pi.
